attributes.action: apply diplomatic pressure on the Sudanese government to immediately drop the charges against and release the British School Teacher, accused of insulting Islam
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: British school teacher Gillian Gibbons has been charged of insulting religion for allowing school children to name a teddy bear Muhammad.  If convicted she faces up to 40 lashes.  Please put an end to this madness now

rejection.details: Mrs Gibbons has now been released.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
